item.title: Hannah add a quote by Douglas McGrath
item.description: "Perhaps it is our imperfections that make us so perfect for one another!" -- Douglas McGrath

item.title: Hannah add a quote by Arthur Rimbaud
item.description: "I'm now making myself as scummy as I can. Why? I want to be a poet, and I'm working at turning myself into a seer. You won't understand any of this, and I'm almost incapable of explaining it to you. The idea is to reach the unknown by the derangement of all the senses. It involves enormous suffering, but one must be strong and be a born poet. It's really not my fault." -- Arthur Rimbaud
